## SRC\_IN\_F variable

Porter-Duff operator. The source that overlaps the destination, replaces the destination.

 porterDuff

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
SRC_IN_F: (out: Color | null, src: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, dest: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>) => Color
```
